sn35.19:1.1: “Yo, bhikkhave, cakkhuṁ abhinandati, dukkhaṁ so abhinandati.
sn35.19:1.2: Yo dukkhaṁ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn35.19:1.5: yo jivhaṁ abhinandati, dukkhaṁ so abhinandati.
sn35.19:1.6: Yo dukkhaṁ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmā”ti vadāmi.
sn35.19:1.8: yo manaṁ abhinandati, dukkhaṁ so abhinandati.
sn35.19:1.9: Yo dukkhaṁ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmā”ti vadāmi.
sn35.19:2.1: “Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, cakkhuṁ nābhinandati, dukkhaṁ so nābhinandati.
sn35.19:2.2: Yo dukkhaṁ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn35.19:2.5: yo jivhaṁ nābhinandati, dukkhaṁ so nābhinandati.
sn35.19:2.6: Yo dukkhaṁ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn35.19:2.8: yo manaṁ nābhinandati, dukkhaṁ so nābhinandati.
sn35.19:2.9: Yo dukkhaṁ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmā”ti vadāmi.
